info.name: SplitLargeFiles
info.description: Splits files larger than the upload limit into smaller chunks that can be redownloaded into a full file later.

changelog.title: Mini-Overhaul
items: React is now used for all visuals where possible, performance should be massively improved
Chunk files now have their own custom icon for message attachments
The Save Files dialog is now used for choosing the location of a downloaded chunk file
